message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $14,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth more to me than that. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in the middle of that?
